title: ECHS Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for 23 Chowkidar, Medical Officer and Other Posts
description: The Ex-Servicemen Contributory Health Scheme (ECHS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 23 Medical Officers, Dental Officers, Pharmacists, Nursing Assistants, Chowkidars, Safaiwalas, and Drivers. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, BDS, B. Pharm, 12th, DMLT, GNM, B.Sc Nursing, and 8th can apply for the ECHS Notification 2026. The intere...
